summary: SIBLINGS is a dark comedy about love, lust, murder and other issues of normal family life.
cast: Alex Campbell|Paul Soles|Andrew Chalmers|Samantha Weinstein|Sarah Gadon|Rocket the Dog|Nicholas Campbell|Sonja Smits|Aaron Abrams|Sarah Polley|Joan Heney|Dorothy Gordon|Martha Burns|Tom McCamus|William Lynn|Shawn Roberts|Barbara Budd
title: Siblings
